title: Conservation and rational use of forest systems in Central Africa

text:
A preselection will take place of planning offices admitted for participating in a restricted invitation to tender to be issued subsequently by the European Communities on behalf of seven Central African countries, in the context of a project financed by the European Development Fund ("Conservation and rational use of forest ecosystems in Central Africa. Project No REG/6203, technical assistance). The project comprises one component per country, each center in a protected area. This preselection relates to the supply of the technical assistance required by all the actions proposed, in particular for the coordination unit, within the components and for the support missions. Preference will be given to candidates able to secure the services of scientific institutions or bodies able to accomplish the tasks of research and training programmed by the project.Further information from:
